People's Daily People's Daily full text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://www.people.com.cn/ 01版要闻 - 陕西推动发展方式绿色低碳转型http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231206_1-01.htm
;Wednesday, December 06, 2023
; ;

;In Nangou Village, Gaoqiao Town, Ansai District, Yan'an City, Shaanxi Province, there is a small bare patch of forest among the trees. hillside. "This piece of yellow is specially reserved for waist drum dancers." Zhang Runsheng, secretary of the Party branch of Nangou Village, said, "Young people are very lively when dancing the waist drum. They have to kick up the loess to make it look good."

;

;From Looking at Shaanxi from northern Shaanxi, the land of Sanqin in winter has strong momentum for green development.

;

;In May this year, General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out when listening to the work report of the Shaanxi Provincial Party Committee and the Provincial Government: "We must focus on promoting the green and low-carbon transformation of the development model and improve the level of ecological civilization construction." Keep in mind General Secretary Xi Jinping's Yin Yin He entrusted the cadres and masses of Shaanxi Province to abide by "green" to shape the ecology, pursue "green" for the future, and use green to empower high-quality development.

;

;Green has become the background color for Shaanxi’s ecological development in the new era.

;

;There is Mu Us Sandy Land in the north, and the green net locks the quicksand; in the south, there is the Hanjiang River and Danjiang River, a long stream of clear water; the Qinling Mountains merge into the north and south, and the Yellow River divides Shaanxi and Shanxi. To protect the ecology, Shaanxi insists that Qingshan will not relax.

;

;Artificial afforestation, aerial seeding afforestation, mountain closure for afforestation... Shaanxi continues to increase greening and protect greening, and solidly promotes major ecological projects such as improving the quality, efficiency and high-quality development of protective forests along the Yellow River. In the past 10 years, more than 9,100 afforestation has been completed. Thousands of acres. The green territory has been advanced more than 400 kilometers north, and Yan'an, Yulin and other places have become "national forest cities".

;

;Protecting the environment and ecology has caused some places in Shaanxi to struggle, but they have persisted.

;

;Caoba Village, Yang County, Hanzhong City, is located in the core area of ​​the Crested Ibis Reserve. "The crested ibis has high environmental requirements and can serve as our 'quality inspector' and 'spokesperson.'" said Liu Yuhua, secretary of the village party branch. Some people were once puzzled: "How can we grow the land if we are not allowed to use pesticides and fertilizers?" The idea has changed: the dry land has been restored to paddy fields, organic fertilizers have been used, and insecticidal lamps have been installed... This once-famous poverty-stricken village has solved the problem of " "Contradictory button" is combined into a "chain of wealth", and the secret lies in two words - "organic". Today, Yang County has certified 110 kinds of organic products in 15 categories and a certified area of ​​170,800 acres. Good ecology brings good days.

;

;People will not let down the green mountains, and the green mountains will never let down people. Apples from Weibei and northern Shaanxi, kiwis from the north and south of the Qinling Mountains, edible fungi from southern Shaanxi, and selenium-rich agricultural products from Qinba... holding an ecological bowl and eating ecological rice, Shaanxi "digs gold" from the ecology, making good mountains and rivers " "Look" is more "value".

;

;Industry must also be green. Shaanxi, which is rich in energy resources, strives to promote the green transformation of the energy industry.

;

;In Shaanxi Yanchang Petroleum Yulin Coal Chemical Co., Ltd., through capture, utilization and storage, liquefied carbon dioxide replaces water and is injected into underground oil flooding. "Last year, we built a carbon dioxide capture project with an annual scale of 300,000 tons, and the annual carbon reduction is equivalent to nearly 17 million trees." said Feng Chenghai, the company's general manager.

;

;To reduce carbon emissions and turn from "black" to "green", Shaanxi is working hard on chain extension, chain repair and chain strengthening. Shaanxi has basically formed a modern coal chemical industry chain such as coal-to-oil, coal-to-ethylene glycol, and coal-based high-end chemicals. Among them, the output value of the coal-to-olefins (aromatic hydrocarbons) industry chain has reached hundreds of billions of yuan, and its production capacity ranks among the top in the country.

;

;Shaanxi, which cherishes green, has tasted the gift of green, and has made greater efforts to improve the greenness of its economy and form a new growth point for green development.

;

;In the first 10 months of this year, the total output value of Shaanxi's automobile manufacturing industry increased by 32.2% year-on-year. Among the new energy vehicles sold on the national market, about 1 in 8 was produced in Shaanxi; the solar photovoltaic industry nationwide Leading the way, products are sold at home and abroad; industrial clusters such as the semiconductor industry and aviation industry continue to develop, and their output value ranks among the top in the country... Green concepts are integrated into industrial development, and the construction of a modern industrial system in Shaanxi is accelerating.

;

;Development is moving from "new" to "green", chasing "light" and "chain". A number of industries with high gold content, new content and green content are accelerating their growth in Sanqin. At present, there are 6 industrial chains in Shaanxi province with an output value exceeding 100 billion yuan. In the first three quarters of this year, the industrial chain achieved an industrial output value of 859.66 billion yuan. "We are accelerating the development of photonics, hydrogen energy, drones, sensors and other industrial chains to become bigger and stronger and create a new engine for economic growth." said Huang Xinbo, deputy director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Industry and Information Technology.

;

;Protect and enhance green, use green to strengthen green. The main responsible comrade of the Shaanxi Provincial Party Committee said: "From the ecological background to the development quality, and then to the bright colors of transformation, the path for Shaanxi's green and low-carbon transformation in the new era is getting wider and wider."

;; Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:56:08 +0800 01版要闻 - 两手抓 两不误 两促进http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231206_2-01.htm
;Wednesday, December 06, 2023
; ;

;“Adhering to the party’s leadership is the essential requirement and fundamental guarantee for Chinese-style modernization.” General Secretary Xi Jinping recently visited Shanghai At the same time, clear requirements were put forward around upholding and strengthening the party's leadership and solidly carrying out the second batch of thematic education, emphasizing that "the second batch of thematic education is coming to an end. We must insist on not lowering the standards and not letting up the momentum, and integrating thematic education with all aspects of work." Together, we can grasp both sides, make sure both are correct, and promote both."

;

;Carrying out thematic education on studying and implementing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era is a major task for party building this year and a major event related to the overall situation. Since the launch of the second batch of thematic education, all localities have paid more attention to arming themselves with theory, classified guidance, strengthening the foundation, overall coordination, and leadership guidance, educating and guiding party members and cadres to firmly establish the concept of political performance that benefits the people. Adhere to asking the people for their plans and needs, focus on solving the urgent, difficult and anxious problems of the people, promote "solving a type of problem" by "analyzing a problem", and effectively transform the enthusiasm for learning and work into overcoming difficulties and doing things The powerful driving force for entrepreneurship will continuously enhance the people's sense of gain, happiness and security through actual results in all aspects of work. The closer we get to the end, the more we need to be prudent and stay the course, to achieve high quality and good results in thematic education, and to ensure solid results.

;

;The most important thing is simplicity. It should be noted that the second batch of thematic education is carried out close to the masses, the contact with the masses is more direct, the contradictions and problems faced are more complex, and the problems that the masses expect to be solved are more specific. The word "real" must be highlighted as it reaches the grassroots level. Insisting on not lowering standards and not slackening motivation, we must implement practical requirements throughout the entire process of thematic education and focus on solving practical problems. It is necessary to listen extensively to the opinions of the masses, take the study and promotion of "four grassroots" as an important starting point, and focus on solving the worries and troubles of the masses, and integrate key measures such as theoretical study, investigation and research, promotion of development, inspection and rectification , and make the work that benefits the people's livelihood, warms the people's hearts, and complies with the public opinion close to the hearts of the people. We must insist on proceeding from reality in everything, firmly grasp the goals and tasks of thematic education, study more on actual results and less on form, do not make superficial articles, do not engage in new tricks, and maintain the political nature and seriousness of thematic education with a strict style. It is necessary to firmly grasp the launch of the second batch of thematic education as an important political task, continue to give full play to the role of the leadership system and working mechanism established in the first batch of thematic education, and prevent the tendency of "relaxing" and "resting", Ensure that theme education starts and ends well and is completed well.

;

;Practicality is a distinctive feature of Marxism, and the purpose of learning is all about application. Only by adhering to the two-pronged approach in educational practice, ensuring both correctness and promotion, and preventing "two skins" can the truth power and practical power of the party's innovative theory be demonstrated. All regions, departments and units must adhere to the center and serve the overall situation, combine the development of thematic education with the implementation of the decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee, and the promotion of the central work of the region, department and unit, so as to improve the overall effectiveness of thematic education, Make the process of carrying out thematic education a process of transforming theoretical learning into practical application, and a process for party members and cadres to improve their ability to perform their duties and enhance their responsibility. At the end of the year and the beginning of the new year, the tasks at the end of the year and the beginning of the new year are heavy and there are many work clues. We must adhere to overall planning and balance, properly handle the relationship between thematic education and central work, coordinate the theme education with the comprehensive completion of various work tasks this year, highlight the promotion of high-quality development, and reflect the effectiveness of thematic education in solving problems in advancing the central work , use the effectiveness of central work to test the effectiveness of theme education.

;

;For ours, the largest Marxist ruling party in the world, only with strong theory can we have clear direction, unified people and sufficient confidence. Persevere in using Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era to focus our minds and souls, insist on not lowering standards and never letting up on motivation, plan, organize, and implement thematic education well, and do a solid job in theoretical study and investigation and research, and do a solid job While reviewing and rectifying outstanding problems, we will do a good job in doing practical things that benefit the people, and do both, make sure we are correct, and promote both. We will definitely be able to use hard work to promote development, win the trust of the people, and show new achievements in promoting Chinese-style modernization. New meteorological actions.

;; Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:56:08 +0800 01版要闻 - 高水平共建西部陆海新通道（高质量发展调研行）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231206_3-01.htm
;Wednesday, December 06, 2023
; ;

;For more than a year, the construction of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor has been progressing steadily——

;

;Leading to new heights , "Accelerating the construction of a new land-sea corridor in the west" was written into the report of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China;

;

;Building a new project, the Pinglu Canal officially started construction, and when completed, it will become the most convenient waterway to the sea in southwest China;

;

;Operation of new lines, "Chongqing-Vientiane-Singapore" rail-road combined transport train, "Chengdu-Qinzhou-Thailand" rail-sea combined transport train, "Guiyang-Horgos-Kazakhstan" Central Asia train, etc. were opened ;

;

;…………

;

;Keeping in mind General Secretary Xi Jinping’s instructions to “jointly build a new land-sea corridor in the west at a high level”, the construction of the new land-sea corridor in the west is accelerating and moving towards high-quality development.

;

;Full chain, large platform, new business formats, Chongqing, Sichuan, Guizhou and other regions participating in the construction of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor continue to innovate the operation and organization model, accelerate infrastructure construction, drive industrial transformation and upgrading, and transform unique location advantages into It can be transformed into the advantages of open development and better services to build a new development pattern.

;

;;Mechanism leads cohesion;

;

;Coordinates all parties, grasps the fingers into a fist, and top-level design mechanism leads the "road" of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor to become wider and wider .

;

;Promote leading enterprises to establish a cross-border e-commerce industry alliance for the New Land-Sea Corridor, explore the establishment of a "complete vehicle-parts" industrial chain cooperation relationship, and increase the number of cross-border railway trains, road-rail combined trains, and cross-border highway shuttles. Increase the density of bank openings and improve the quality and efficiency of trade finance services... To plan for the future, 20 work points in 7 categories have been refined.

;

;In April this year, the Ministry of Commerce, together with relevant departments and 13 relevant provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities, held the first meeting of the cooperation working mechanism to promote the construction of the New International Land-Sea Trade Corridor in Chongqing. All parties collide with needs, seek consensus, and promote more efficient cooperation.

;

;The new mechanism promotes the formation of a new layout. At present, a provincial inter-ministerial joint meeting for the New Western Land-Sea Corridor has been established at the national level, and 12 western provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities have formed a "13+2" cooperation mechanism with Hainan Province, Zhanjiang City in Guangdong Province, and Huaihua City in Hunan Province.

;

;The policy effects continue to be released, activating the "innovation pool" for the construction of the New Land-Sea Corridor, and the steady development momentum continues to increase.

;

;On October 12, a train carrying 950 tons of imported minerals from the New Western Land-Sea Corridor sailed into Chongqing Guoyuan Port. After checking the declaration elements of the enterprise, Chongqing Port Customs determined that the domestic railway freight of 87,400 yuan will not be included in the dutiable value of the goods. This marks the official implementation of the innovative initiative of "Domestic Railway Freight Deduction for Sea-Rail Multimodal Transport under the New Western Land-Sea Corridor".

;

;“This innovative measure is highly targeted and benefits a wide range of people. It can actually save costs, attract more goods to be transferred along the New Western Land-Sea Corridor, and drive the expansion of the channel to improve quality and efficiency.” Chongqing Customs Xiao Hui, deputy director of the Customs Department, said.

;

;Services are frequently "new", allowing enterprises to get more benefits.

;

;With the help of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor, Hengdu Group, a leading enterprise in Fengdu County, Chongqing, imports beef from South America through the rail-sea combined transport cold chain. "Adopting the new 'one box to the end' model and changing the inspection location from coastal ports to Chongqing local, transportation routes, logistics costs, port customs clearance, and transit efficiency have been significantly optimized, and market competitiveness has been greatly enhanced." said Zhu Gangquan, vice president of Hengdu Group.

;

;Relying on the national market procurement and trade method to pilot the Dazu Longshui Hardware Market, Dazu District, Chongqing explores new paths to integrate the construction of international logistics channels and new foreign trade formats, and is assisted by measures such as value-added tax exemption, convenient customs clearance, and innovation in foreign exchange settlement. "Group" export of small commodities...

;

;New exploration has given rise to a new atmosphere in the channel. Data show that in 2022, the trade volume between the 13 co-constructed provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities of the Western Land-Sea Corridor and the ten ASEAN countries will exceed US$130 billion, an increase of 73.3% from the beginning of the channel in 2017, and has exceeded US$100 billion for three consecutive years.

;

;;Interconnection improves quality and efficiency;

;

;Infrastructure weaves "threads" into a "network", which is the "road" of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor that fully plays its role One of the keys.

;

;At Sichuan Chengdu International Railway Port, the Sichuan-Guangxi-Sea Railway Intermodal Trains are operating stably and the shipment volume continues to grow. "Starting from Chengdu and transferring to the ASEAN region via Qinzhou Port in Guangxi can save more than half the time compared with the previous river-sea combined transport method." Huang Jun, director of the dispatching workshop of Chengdu North Station of China Railway Chengdu Bureau Group Co., Ltd., was deeply touched.

;

;More changes are taking place across mountains and seas, connecting the world.

;

;After the new Chengdu-Kunming Railway is opened to traffic at the end of 2022, with the help of the "Lancang-Mekong Express" international freight train, the transportation time from Vientiane, Laos to Chengdu can be shortened to two days and 17 hours.

;

;In July this year, the upgraded version of the "Lanmei-Rongcheng-Europe Express" was launched. The train carrying auto parts and other goods departed from Rayong, Thailand, via the China-Laos Railway from Vientiane, Laos to the Chengdu International Railway Port, then connected to the China-Europe Express to Europe, and finally arrived in Budapest, Hungary. The transportation time was shortened to 15 days at the fastest, achieving The China-Laos railway and the China-Europe train line are connected, creating a new Asia-Chengdu-Europe corridor.

;

;As of October this year, the logistics network of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor has covered 139 stations in 69 cities in 18 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities in my country, and has access to 480 ports in 120 countries and regions around the world. In the first three quarters of this year, the rail-sea intermodal trains of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor transported 633,000 TEUs, a year-on-year increase of 14%.

;

;The transportation structure is also continuing to be optimized. “In addition to rail-sea combined transport, road-rail combined transport, river-rail-sea combined transport, high sea combined transport, air channels, etc. are also accelerating development. The jointly built provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities continue to promote the deep integration of transportation modes and build land-water connections with relevant countries and regions in Asia and Europe. The efficient intermodal transport system promotes interoperability and sharing." Liu Wei, director of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor Logistics and Operations Organization Center, said.

;

;Hardware facilities have become stronger, and the level of logistics operations and service guarantees has also improved. Guizhou, Yunnan and other places are promoting the application of the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) rules in the construction of the New Land-Sea Corridor in accordance with local conditions; Chongqing is fully implementing the rapid railway customs clearance model and innovating the "Bonded+" series of new foreign trade formats.

;

;What’s even more gratifying is that innovative empowerment has enabled this “road” to be connected on the “cloud”. Through the construction of digital and information platforms, the jointly constructed provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities have launched a series of convenient online services. Ningxia's international trade "single window" has launched 781 service functions in 19 categories, and 38 types of import and export supervision certificates are all accepted through the "single window". Xinjiang promotes the integrated development of 5G, new infrastructure and transportation infrastructure, improves the sharing capabilities of channel information platforms, and promotes the intensive and efficient development of channel transportation resources.

;

;By optimizing the service environment and removing constraints, the New Western Land-Sea Corridor will move towards smoother travel and improved quality and efficiency.

;

;;Activate smooth industrial circulation;

;

;Drive the efficient aggregation of various resource elements and promote the industrial transformation and upgrading of areas along the route. The "road" of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor has been Give it a richer connotation.

;

;In 2022, 78 new train lines will be opened in the Western Land-Sea Corridor. Specialty products such as Laos rice and Thai durian will enter the Chinese market and be sold to the European market. More western specialties such as "Guizhou Laoganma" will be opened. Also go abroad.

;

;"Taking advantage of" the New Land-Sea Corridor, Meitan County, Zunyi City, Guizhou Province has accelerated the pace of tea exports to the sea, forming a complete tea export industry chain and supply chain. "Most of the company's products go south along the New Western Land-Sea Corridor, are transported by land to sea ports in Guangxi, and then reach Southeast Asian countries by sea. The time to sea is greatly shortened." Yu Nenghong, general manager of Zunyi Qiwei Mingxiang Tea Import and Export Co., Ltd. Said, "We have established long-term cooperative relationships with many tea companies in Southeast Asia." In the first nine months of 2023, Meitan County's direct tea export volume was US$36.8972 million, a year-on-year increase of 11.4%.

;

;Dushan County, located in the southern part of Guizhou Province, plays the role of the fulcrum of the New Western Land-Sea Corridor to build an important comprehensive logistics distribution center and bulk industrial product trading center in southern Guizhou and northern Guizhou. While promoting the development of an open economy, Promote the development of related industries such as basic materials and new building materials. In the first half of this year, the added value of industries above designated size in Dushan County accounted for more than one-third of the county's GDP.

;

;Currently, Guizhou is taking the construction of new corridors as a guide to cultivate and build high-quality modern economic and trade corridors and modern industrial corridors, give full play to the driving role of corridors in economic development along the routes, and promote the optimization and upgrading of regional industrial structure.

;

;Relying on advantageous industries such as automobiles and electronic information, Chongqing’s import and export trade volume with countries and regions co-building the “Belt and Road” will reach 333.14 billion yuan in 2022, attracting 319 Fortune 500 companies to Chongqing. invest. Domestic enterprises have cooperated with Laos to build a modern agricultural industrial park project, and have cooperated with Cambodia to explore an integrated banana supply chain of "transportation, trade and industry"... Each of these vivid cases explains the industrial driving effect of the construction of the new land-sea corridor.

;

;Channels bring logistics, logistics brings economy and trade, and economy and trade bring industry, and the linkage effect is increasingly apparent. "The New Western Land-Sea Corridor has become an important link for smooth dual circulation. Using economy and trade to drive more global industrial division of labor and cooperation, linking my country's western region with Southeast Asian and European markets will help create a new situation of high-quality development." Liu Wei express.

;

;(Our reporters Wang Mingfeng and Su Bin participated in the interview)

;; Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:56:08 +0800 01版要闻 - 中央编办等五部门联合印发《关于做好大学生乡村医生专项计划编制保障工作的通知》http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231206_4-01.htm
;Wednesday, December 06, 2023
; ;

;This newspaper, Beijing, December 5th  (Reporter Zhao Cheng) Rural doctors are my country’s rural medical and health services At the bottom of the network, the Party Central Committee attaches great importance to the construction of a team of rural doctors. In order to guide and encourage medical college graduates to enrich and optimize the team of rural doctors and promote the employment of college graduates, the Central Commission for Education, the National Health Commission, the Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Finance, and the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security recently jointly issued the "On Doing a Good Job in Rural Affairs for College Students" Notice on the preparation and guarantee of doctors’ special plans.

;

;The notice clarifies that the 2023 college graduates recruited in accordance with the special plan for college students and rural doctors in various places, as well as those who have passed the "Medical College Graduates Exemption from Examination to Apply for Rural Doctor Practice Registration Policy" since the 2020 COVID-19 epidemic, have entered the village health system. College students working in clinics will be recruited through open recruitment by public institutions and selected as staff of township health centers to work in village clinics, and will be provided with institutional guarantees in accordance with procedures.

;

;In order to strengthen the role of staff guidance and guarantee, the notice requires that the county-level health department is responsible for the overall coordination of college student rural doctors employed within the county, giving priority to rural clinics in remote towns and villages. Provincial-level institutional establishment departments, together with health, finance, human resources and social security departments, will coordinate among counties and give priority to remote and economically underdeveloped cities and counties. The establishment required for college rural doctors who are recruited according to the special plan and are actually on duty will be given priority to be adjusted within the existing establishment of township health centers. If there are indeed difficulties in the adjustment, the establishment of special establishment for township health centers will be increased. The special plan for college student rural doctors shall be compiled exclusively for special purposes and under special management. The staffing and personnel relations of employed college student rural doctors are in township health centers, and their jobs are in village clinics. The minimum number of years of working in village clinics is specified. The staff vacated by exchanges of employed college student rural doctors, termination of employment contracts, etc. will be used for subsequent annual recruitment of college student rural doctors. Township health centers bear the main responsibility for the daily management of employed college student rural doctors.

;

;The notice emphasizes that the establishment departments of various local institutions shall establish a special plan preparation account for college rural doctors and implement real-name management. No unit or individual may misappropriate, occupy, impersonate or use in disguised form the special plan for rural college students for any reason or in any form. It is strictly prohibited to take advantage of the opportunity of special approval to increase the number of staff, free ride on the number of staff, and it is strictly prohibited to artificially add village clinics, increase the number of rural doctors, or dismiss existing qualified rural doctors under various pretexts. Once violations of regulations and disciplines are discovered, the employer, management department and relevant responsible persons will be held accountable in accordance with regulations and disciplines.

; Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:56:08 +0800 01版要闻 - 渔光互补 生态富民http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231206_5-01.htm
;Wednesday, December 06, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;

;
; ;

;Lanxi City, Zhejiang Province implements the concept of green development and promotes the construction of "fishing and light complementary" photovoltaic power generation projects. According to statistics, the city's "fish-light complementary" breeding area reaches more than 2,800 acres, which can save 54,000 tons of standard coal consumption every year. It also broadens the income channels for local farmers and achieves both ecological and economic benefits. The picture shows a "fishing and photovoltaic complementary" project built by State Grid in Xihe Village, Lanxi City.

;

;Photo by Fan Yuxin (People’s Vision)

;; Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:56:08 +0800 01版要闻 - 全域治水护水 守好一库碧水http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231206_6-01.htm
;Wednesday, December 06, 2023
; ;

;The Danjiangkou Reservoir, located at the junction of Shiyan, Hubei and Nanyang, Henan, is the largest artificial freshwater lake in Asia and the center line of the South-to-North Water Diversion Project. water source area.

;

;In May 2021, General Secretary Xi Jinping came to Nanyang to investigate the South-to-North Water Diversion Project and hosted a symposium. He emphasized that the ecological and environmental protection of water source areas should be the top priority, draw hard lines, and be firm and unswerving. Move on to do all the work well and protect this reservoir of clear water.

;

;Keeping in mind General Secretary Xi Jinping’s instructions, Shiyan City adheres to water control and protection in the entire region and resolutely protects a reservoir of clear water. “As one of the core water source areas of the South-to-North Water Diversion Middle Route Project, we place water control and water protection in a prominent position, coordinate the promotion of high-level protection and high-quality development, resolutely safeguard the bottom line of water safety, water environment safety, and ecological safety, and ensure a reservoir of clear water Sustainable transportation to the north. Danjiangkou Reservoir water quality maintains or is better than Class II standards all year round." Huang Jianxiong, Secretary of the Shiyan Municipal Party Committee, said.

;

;Five rivers including the Jianhe River, which flows through the urban area of ​​Shiyan and merges into the Danjiangkou Reservoir, once had serious problems with the direct discharge of domestic sewage and industrial wastewater. They were once classified as inferior Class V water bodies.

;

;More than 10 heavily polluting enterprises have been closed and relocated, more than 70 kilometers of sewage interception pipe networks have been built, and 17 kilometers of ecologically restored rivers have been restored... After all-round management of the entire basin, the Jianhe River, which used to be hard to find fish and shrimps, has become An ecological and water-friendly paradise for citizens, rare birds frequently appear.

;

;In the past, the "river of pollution" is now clear. All water bodies inferior to Class V have been eliminated, and the management of the "Five Rivers" of Shending River, Si River, Jian River, Jian River, and Guanshan River has become a model for the treatment of black and smelly water bodies in the country. "Although the total annual inflow of the 'Five Rivers' is less than 1% of the water storage capacity of the Danjiangkou Reservoir, we have used 100% of our efforts to carry out systematic management, and have invested a total of more than 30 billion yuan in recent years." Lan Lan, Director of Shiyan Municipal Ecological Environment Bureau Jinsong said.

;

;With ironclad measures and ironclad responsibilities, Shiyan City continues to carry out pollution prevention and control efforts——

;

;——Resolutely control the pollution. Danjiangkou City, Shiyan City, closed 166 polluting and energy-consuming enterprises such as metallurgy, chemicals, and cement. Shiyan City has closed or converted more than 560 enterprises above designated size with serious pollution.

;

;——Resolutely prohibited. Danjiangkou City has implemented permanent protection within 1 kilometer of the waterfront of the reservoir area. Shiyan City has implemented a ban on mining, fishing, and breeding in accordance with the law. 182,000 cages in the reservoir area and 219,000 acres of seine nets in the reservoir area have been dismantled, and 50,000 fishermen have switched to production and come ashore.

;

;——Resolute treatment. We will solidly carry out the "Ten Major Challenges" such as stabilizing water quality and meeting standards and controlling total phosphorus in the reservoir area, deepen the branch management mechanism of branch ditches, improve the monitoring and assessment system of cross-border water environment quality in counties and townships, and promote the comprehensive management of small watersheds... "Shiyan uses 'Eighteen kinds of martial arts' have introduced and applied 27 mainstream sewage treatment processes." said Liu Gang, director of Shiyan Ecological Environment Technology Center.

;

;——Resolutely build. Promoting all sewage collection, treatment, and compliance with standards, Shiyan City has built 119 urban sewage treatment plants and 1,967 rural domestic sewage treatment facilities, with a centralized sewage treatment rate of 96%. Focusing on tree planting, soil and water conservation, and building ecological barriers at multiple levels, the city's forest coverage rate has increased to 73.86%.

;

;Green and low-carbon development is the fundamental solution to ecological and environmental problems. Anchoring the positioning of "green and low-carbon development demonstration zone", Shiyan City accelerates the green transformation of industries. Danjiangkou City has introduced Zhejiang Nongfu Spring Co., Ltd. to build a water plant. This year’s tax revenue is expected to be 800 million yuan, and the output value will exceed 4 billion yuan.

;

;Built and prospered because of cars, Shiyan City is known as the "cradle of Dongfeng Motors" and "the capital of commercial vehicles in China". Today, this automobile city is making every effort to promote the transformation of the automobile industry: from traditional fuel vehicles to new energy and intelligent connected vehicles, from commercial vehicles to coordinated development of both commercial and passenger vehicles, and from the automobile industry to the coordinated development of automobile-related industries. In the first three quarters of this year, Shiyan's new energy vehicle exports accounted for 51.3% of the province's total; from January to October, the new battery industry achieved an output value of 13.47 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 82.8%.

;

;Walking into the vehicle factory assembly workshop of Dongfeng Commercial Vehicle Co., Ltd., robotic arms are waving in the air, and intelligent logistics robots shuttle back and forth. After more than 10 processes, new energy commercial vehicles are rolling off the assembly line one after another.

;

;"We are vigorously researching the key technologies of the 'three electrics' of new energy commercial vehicles, completing the ecosystem layout of the three technical lines of pure electric, hydrogen and hybrid, and realizing the green and low-carbonization of end products." Dongfeng Commercial Li Lianzhi, deputy director of the Vehicle Service Product Planning and Development Department, introduced.

;

;From making new energy and intelligent connected cars bigger and stronger, to accelerating the high-quality development of the whole-region tourism industry led by Wudang Mountain, to accelerating the construction of "source living water-purified water-functional drinks- "Food Processing" integrated industrial chain to create a 100-billion-level aquatic industry cluster, Shiyan is working hard to explore new ways to deeply integrate industrial development and ecological protection, and to simultaneously improve ecological and economic benefits. In the first three quarters, Shiyan City's regional GDP reached 172.315 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 6.7%, 0.6 percentage points higher than the province's; the added value of high-tech industries accounted for 15% of the regional GDP; local general public budget revenue increased by 21.4% %, the growth rate ranks among the top in the province.

;; Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:56:08 +0800 01版要闻 - 我国快递年业务量首次突破1200亿件（新数据 新看点）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231206_7-01.htm
;Wednesday, December 06, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;Data source: State Post Bureau< BR/>;Drawing: Zhang Danfeng

;
; ;

;This newspaper, Beijing, December 5th  ( Reporters Han Xin and Song Haoxin) At 18:26 on December 4, real-time monitoring data from the Express Big Data Platform of the State Post Bureau showed that my country’s 120 billionth express shipment was produced this year, and the annual express delivery business exceeded the 120 billion mark for the first time, setting another history. new highs. Since March 2023, my country's monthly express delivery volume has exceeded 10 billion, and the average monthly business revenue has exceeded 90 billion yuan, also a record high.

;

;Behind the 120 billion items, the development resilience of my country’s express delivery industry is demonstrated. In recent years, my country's express delivery industry has maintained a steady growth momentum, with business volume leaping from "10 billion per year" to "10 billion per month". The express delivery industry with a global service network has become the most comprehensive and comprehensive transportation mode in the modern logistics field. The representative industry with the best applications, the highest level of informatization and intelligence, and the fastest improvement in production efficiency. (See page 7 for related reports)

;; Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:56:08 +0800 02版要闻 - 山东加快构建现代化产业体系（深入推进新型工业化）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231206_1-02.htm
;Wednesday, December 06, 2023
; ;

;“The investment in transformation is worth it!” Wang Qinghua, deputy general manager of Haoke Technology Co., Ltd., Jining High-tech Zone, Shandong, told reporters that the company Mainly engaged in polyester fiber flexible mesh and geosynthetic materials for mining. After the digital transformation of the production line was completed this year, the quality and efficiency have been improved, and the inventory backlog has been reduced.

;

;In Shandong, thanks to the new industrialization construction, many companies are entering the fast lane of development. Adhering to the requirement of high-quality development throughout the entire process of new industrialization, Shandong takes high-end, intelligent, green and clustering as the direction, focuses on accelerating the transformation and upgrading of the manufacturing industry and enhancing core competitiveness, and deeply promotes advanced manufacturing to make the province strong. Take action to accelerate the construction of a modern industrial system.

;

;;Activating data elements;

;

;;Integrated development of data and reality;

;

;Walking into the workshop of Haoke Technology, The needles of the large-scale woven equipment jumped up and down, the silver wire penetrated at this end, and the mesh cloth at the other end flowed out.

;

;The black monitor on the "back" of the device attracts attention. Wang Qinghua said that this is an intelligent gateway that uses sensors to collect production data in a timely manner and transmits it to the backend production and operation management system, intelligent equipment management system, etc., and conducts data analysis and monitoring through the industrial Internet platform to achieve intelligent management of the production process.

;

;Previously, Haoke Technology's production relied heavily on manual labor and was low-efficiency. In March this year, Jining Industrial Internet Demonstration Benchmark Enterprise Cultivation Activity was launched, introducing national-level "dual-span" industrial Internet platforms such as Inspur, Haier Kaos, and Blue Ocean, using big data, cloud computing, 5G, Internet of Things, and artificial intelligence technologies , empowering local enterprises in smart manufacturing and digital transformation.

;

;Haoke Technology invested 3 million yuan to transform the industrial Internet production line. Today’s production process is oriented to sales orders. The platform automatically schedules production, orders and equipment are matched. Equipment energy consumption is reduced by 5% and material consumption is reduced by 6%. %, product profitability increased by 1.6%, and delivery time was reduced by 5 days on average.

;

;Accelerate the construction of a modern industrial system supported by the real economy, and the integrated development of digital and real industries has given rise to the vitality of more and more traditional manufacturing companies. In the Wucheng Economic and Technological Development Zone of Dezhou City, Dezhou Chunxiang Packaging Products Co., Ltd. has undergone digital transformation, and its overall physical indicators such as product adhesion, bursting strength, and sensing power have been greatly improved. The folding strength has increased by 20% to 30% compared with the original. %, and the delivery cycle is shortened by 50%.

;

;;Stimulate the power of innovation;

;

;;Achieve technological breakthroughs;

;

;The difference between the positive and negative temperatures in the furnace does not exceed 3 degrees Celsius, the quenching transfer time is controlled within 15 seconds, and the key indicators have reached the world's first-class level. In June this year, a high-precision aluminum alloy roller hearth furnace was successfully trial-produced by Nanshan Aluminum Industry in Longkou City, Yantai City.

;

;This kind of roller hearth furnace is an essential high-precision equipment for the production of aerospace aluminum materials. Its manufacturing technology has been monopolized by foreign companies for a long time. “Only by mastering key technologies can we have autonomy,” said Lu Zhengfeng, chairman and general manager of Nanshan Aluminum.

;

;Longkou City deepens the cooperation between industry, academia, research and government, vigorously strengthens the construction of cluster innovation platforms, and strengthens key technology research and development innovation. Nanshan Aluminum makes full use of technology research and development platforms such as national enterprise technology centers, academician workstations, and postdoctoral workstations to build an aluminum alloy pressure processing engineering technology research center; it cooperates with China Aviation Development Beijing Aeronautical Materials Research Institute, Shandong University, Central South University, etc. to invest It took 33 million yuan and 4 years to successfully develop a high-precision aluminum alloy roller hearth furnace with completely independent intellectual property rights, reducing the equipment cost by 2/3.

;

;The joint innovation team of Nanshan Aluminum has successively conquered key technologies such as aviation aluminum alloy melt purification, successfully developed 5 thick plate and thin plate products, and successfully passed the COMAC certification, making domestic large aircraft " Made of domestic aluminum alloy material.

;

;Technological innovation opens the way and new productivity surges. Enterprise orders are pouring in, and the industrial chain is also experiencing rapid development. Ren Wu, director of the Longkou Municipal Bureau of Industry and Information Technology, introduced that more than 20 key aluminum companies in Longkou have grown together. Aluminum products cover more than 100 series and more than 6,000 specifications, covering aerospace, rail transit, auto parts, etc. The application scenarios form a complete aluminum processing industry chain.

;

;Led by Nanshan Aluminum, the Longkou City Transportation Aluminum Industry Cluster was selected into the 2022 Small and Medium Enterprise Characteristic Industrial Cluster released by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology. In the first half of this year, the total output value of the cluster reached 48.3 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 13.6%. By the end of the year, the total output value is expected to be about 100 billion yuan.

;

;In recent years, Shandong has accelerated its improvement of innovation capabilities, and its number of national-level enterprise technology centers, technological innovation demonstration enterprises, and industrial design centers ranks among the top in the country. Technological innovation helps companies gain a say in the market. Guoxin Foil (Shandong) New Materials Co., Ltd., located in Lanshan District, Rizhao City, has overcome technical difficulties and can process a piece of crude steel into 0.01 mm titanium foil. The thickness is 1/10 of ordinary A4 paper, and 1 kg can be sold More than 10,000 yuan. "As long as we persist in innovation, we are not afraid of not having a market." said Liu Wenju, chairman of the company.

;

;;Conversion of old and new driving forces;

;

;;Green and low-carbon development;

;

;Enter the exploration of Linyi County, Dezhou City Tong Development Co., Ltd., the park is clean and tidy and covered with vegetation. In the workshop, the smooth stove of the smooth -type cannon is burning the oil coke. The production residual heat is collected for the production of power generation and living heat in the plant area; the sewage flowing into the sewage treatment station in the park is used for comprehensive circulation.

;

; "Adhere to green and low carbon can development be sustainable." The relevant person in charge of the development of Sotong said that after integrating innovation, the company turns oil coke and coal as asphalt into treasures. It can save 6,750 tons of petroleum coke each year, reduce carbon dioxide emissions by 25,000 tons, and receive a national manufacturing single champion demonstration enterprise and a national "green plant".

;

; Cooperating with the province's local energy refining capacity integration and transfer, Shandong Hengyuan Petrochemical Group Co., Ltd. withdrew from the refining industry, investing 4.1 billion yuan in planning and construction of needle -shaped coke and the carbon material industry chain to achieve green and energy -saving transformation. . Recently, the project has been put into operation, and it can produce 160,000 tons of high -quality needle -shaped coke annually, and the annual sales revenue can be 3 billion yuan.

;

; Since the implementation of the new and old kinetic energy conversion project, Shandong's backward production capacity has been accelerated. Cumulative governance of more than 110,000 enterprises in "scattered pollution", chemical parks have been reduced from 199 to 84, and the entry rate of chemical enterprises has increased from less than 20%to 38%. 18.66 million tons.

;

; The traditional high -energy industry has transformed in an orderly manner, and strategic emerging industries have also accelerated the layout. In Jinan, the development of big data and cloud computing industries, and the scale of new energy vehicles is increasing; in Qingdao, the industrial Internet has accelerated the construction; in Heze, the biomedical industry has become a new growth pole; Urban transformation ...

;

; In -depth implementation of the new and old kinetic energy conversion projects, Shandong has increased the average annual growth rate of nearly 15%of the value -added of high -tech manufacturing in Shandong in the past three years. .

;

; In the first October of this year, the industrial added value of Shandong's regulations increased by 6.9%year -on -year, and industrial investment increased by 14.5%, which was 9.2 percentage points higher than the growth rate of all investment. The output value of high -tech industries accounted for the first time.

;

; Zhang Haibo, director of the Department of Industry and Information Technology of Shandong Province, said that Shandong will accelerate the construction The modern industrial system of the track has resolutely picked up the beams in the development of new industrialization, and strives to contribute to the construction of a strong country.

; In order to thoroughly study and implement Xi Jinping's new era of socialist thought with Chinese characteristics and the spirit of the 20th major spirit of the party, to motivate the majority of civil servants to establish Practice the correct concept of political performance, fully implement new development concepts, perform their duties and do their responsibilities, really do hard work, and promote high quality development with high -quality work. ; ; Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:56:08 +0800 02版要闻 - 拉日高速公路工程主体全线贯通（记录中国）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-12/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231206_4-02.htm
; Wednesday, December 06, 2023
; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ;
; ;
;

; The picture shows Latri shot on December 5th on December 5 Highway Kaba No. 2 Special Bridge.
; Photo by Diji Sanm (Visual)

;
; ;

; This newspaper Lhasa December 5th Diaben & nbsp; & nbsp; (Reporter Yuan Quan) On December 5, the G4218 Yaye Expressway Lhasa to Shigatse Airport Section (hereinafter referred to as the "La Ri Expressway") Puba Tunnel's left hole penetrated, marking the La Niki Expressway Highway The main body of the engineering body has laid a solid foundation for the completion of the traffic at the end of June next year.

;

; The total mileage of the Latri highway is 166.98 kilometers, the two -way four -lane, and the design speed is 100 kilometers per hour. There are 22 tunnels and 122 bridges, and a bridge -tunnel ratio of 51%. The current second -phase engineering bridge tunnel ratio is as high as 72%. The highway engineering line is located in the Yarlung Tibetan Canyon area. The slopes along the line are deep and the geology is complicated. Natural disasters such as collapse and mudslides are prone to occur in the rainy season. The last Puba Tunnel's left hole is 3795 meters long, the right hole is 3715 meters long, and the maximum burial depth is 448 meters. It is a special tunnel.

;

; The La Ri Expressway has nine continuous rigid bridges including the Wutun Yalu Tibetan Bridge, the Sagaya Tibetan Bridge, and the Pubajuru Tibetan Bridge. The bridge crosses the deep mountain gorge. Among them, the largest pier of the Karujaro Tibetan Bridge is as high as 72 meters, and the maximum span of the Yarlung Bujiang Special Bridge and the Pubajuru Tibetan Bridge of Tagu Village reached 170 meters.

;

; The longest tunnel on the entire line is Panti Mountain Tunnel, with a total length of 4587 meters on the left and 4568 meters on the right. The builder adopts the method of geological radar, electromagnetic transient, and advanced explorators to grasp the situation of the geylne in front of the palm in front of the palm, and reasonably arrange blasting and strengthen support of supporting deformation monitoring to ensure steadily advancement of construction.

;

; The commander of the Lathe Highway Engineering Headquarters introduced that the builders have overcome the construction problems brought by the crushing belt, rushing mud, swallow, etc. , Ensure that the construction of the entire bridge is advanced.

;

; Latri highway is part of Tibet's important channel for Nania to open to South Asia. It is also a transportation link between Nepal and other neighboring countries such as the “Belt and Road” initiative. After completion, it will further optimize the regional road network structure, improve road transportation capacity and driving safety, and improve the national comprehensive transportation channel.

; ; Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:56:08 +0800
